website_summaries.verdict: Comfort and outstanding delivery on trails are the pride of the Salewa Wander Hiker GTX. The effectiveness of its technologies received good remarks. It’s no wonder that people view it as a worthy purchase regardless of its steep price. On the flip side, there a few setbacks especially with the laces. Nevertheless, a little modification on the lacing can put the Salewa Wander Hiker GTX on the list of the best day hiking shoe for wide-footed adventurers.
pros: Several outdoor addicts were stoked with the performance of the shoe regardless of the type of terrain
A handful of users and an expert approved the comfort given by the Salewa Wander Hiker GTX
Its ultra-expensive price was worth it considering the effectiveness of the features of this day hiking shoe, as mentioned by a lot of users
A good deal of adventurers praised the Michelin outsole for its reliable grip
According to numerous satisfied wide-footed wearers, the Wander Hiker GTX fits them perfectly
cons: A few wearers were disappointed with the very long laces
The low cuff of the Salewa Wander Hiker GTX annoyed an expert as he experienced frequent heel rubbing

customer_reviews.title: Best quality hiking shoes I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality shoes, that were bought to replace a well loved and worn pair of North Face Wreck hiking shoes. I would say the quality of these even beats the north face shoes which lasted years. Time will tell of course but very happy. The Michelin soles grip well. They look great in my opinion and super comfy. Also bought a pair of Keen mid heoght boots but I'm so impressed with Salewa I'm thinking of selling the keen and getting Salewa boots as well as the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: kaizen

customer_reviews.title: The hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pros Awesome shoe design High quality build and beautiful overlay of material and craftsmanship Rugged feel and built like a tank New Michelin rubber is great Value for money Cons Sizing has to carefully checked. I wear an Adidas terrex shoe at size UK 11 and the salewa shoes are perfect at size UK 10.5 I prefer lightweight shows and this one is slightly heavy but not an issue. Laces are high quality but are too long Could be wider but will probably break-in in time
customer_reviews.author: B. Waruna Gomis

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These are a good looking pair of outdoor shoes that won’t look out of place if they are worn in either an office or urban setting. However, they’re a bit pricey for what you get, and in my opinion they are let down by the flexi heel - which can rub against the back of your foot - and the fact that they don’t have a fully gusseted tongue.
customer_reviews.author: dlamb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality and extremely comfortable giving confidence across all terrain despite normally wearing boots for rocky areas for ankle support these were so grippy had no problems with loosing footing, have even used them for walking to and from workplace because of the comfort and even for mountain biking.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoes
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace an old pair of big brand shoes after they lost their waterproofness pretty quickly. I tried these on a whim having never heard of the brand, and I have to say they are great. The fit is pretty perfect and they feel very comfortable. I can slide them on and off without undoing the laces which I like. Tried them on a walk on a wet common with lots of boggy grasses, etc and the shoes performed much better than my previous shoes. If you are willing to try a new brand and can overlook the dodgy English on the labels, these are great shoes. I expect I’ll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are incredibly excellent. Never thought I would be happy with any other maker than Ecco.
customer_reviews.author: krzysztof Kojta

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fantastic. Great looks. They fit me perfectly and they are extremely light. I wasn't expecting that
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: These are a fantastic walking shoe. Have done a few five mile walks ... amazing like walking on air. Can not wait to do a good treck over the mountains...
customer_reviews.author: Ant i Potter

customer_reviews.title: Like slippers
customer_reviews.text: Proper comfy! Feel extremely sturdy, but like wearing slippers! Not the cheapest but so far very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair my husband has had-he says most comfortable walking shoes he has ever had !
